identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
anti_patterns: No centered layouts for data-heavy views

containers.card: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 rounded-sm shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-sm shadow-lg shadow-blue-600/20 transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 font-medium py-3 px-6 rounded-sm
buttons.danger: bg-red-500 hover:bg-red-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-sm

inputs.default: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 rounded-sm h-12 px-4

status_badges.active: bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700 border border-emerald-200 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider
status_badges.pending: bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 border border-amber-200 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider
status_badges.error: bg-red-100 text-red-700 border border-red-200 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider

visual_enhancers.gradients: No full screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in headers only.
visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on dark backgrounds to prevent banding.

bilingual_strategy.rule: The app must support dynamic language switching (Arabic/French).
bilingual_strategy.implementation: Use a global context for language. When Arabic is selected, set <html dir='rtl'>. Use Tailwind logical properties (ms-*, me-*, ps-*, pe-*) instead of left/right where possible.
bilingual_strategy.fonts: Switch font-family based on language: 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic' for Arabic, 'IBM Plex Sans' for French.

gps_integration.method: Embed via iframe in the 'Fleet Tracking' module. Ensure the iframe is responsive and has a fallback loading state.

contracts.style: Legal documents must look like paper. Use a white container with a subtle drop shadow, serif font, and high contrast text. The digital signature field should be prominent.

dashboard.layout: Use the 'Control Room' grid. High density. Dark mode map widget. Key metrics (Revenue, Active Cars, Alerts) at the top.

tech_stack_specifics.components: Use the existing Shadcn components in /components/ui. They are .jsx files. Customize them via Tailwind classes, do not rewrite the logic unless necessary.
tech_stack_specifics.icons: Use lucide-react (default) or @phosphor-icons/react for a more technical look.

universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
